column4: i can't play audio files using audio players. can somebody help me fix this?
﻿ActionParsnip: yup but i have played the files before.
﻿﻿andybleaden: i have played it before using amarok.
﻿andybleaden: i have tried a lot of players but still dont work.
run your audio player in terminal and see if there's any error
did u hit play before u paste it?
hit play and repaste...did u see any errors?
select a song and hit play again
do u see a speaker icon on the panel (jst to check ur soudncard)
upper right if ur on gnome, lower right if ur on kde
i dont use exaile so not really sure what the errors mean, did u try other media players like rhythmbox or amarok?
u can check your sound here: system->preferences->sound...there are test buttons there
